name: Spin Out
description: You spin furiously by straining your legs. Make a melee attack, dealing 4d4 + MOVE steel damage on a hit. Until the beginning of your next turn, you have disadvantage on all DEX saves and your speed is halved.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
